title: 论坛经常504是咋个回事
author: 西瓜太郎
txt_content:
504 Gateway Time-outThe gateway did not receive a timely response from the upstream server or application. Sorry for the inconvenience.
Please report this message and include the following information to us.
Thank you very much!URL:http://www.mcbbs.net/home.php?mod=space&uid=326265Server:cn-zj-cmcc8Date:2014/11/23 11:17:03Powered by Tengine




如上

replies.txt_content:
因为爱情。。。
好吧。。说实话我不知道{:10_516:}

replies.author: GhostAngelJQ
replies.txt_content: 因为你的电脑快鲍了，赶紧送到维修站检修吧。

replies.author: RAY5DHao
replies.txt_content:
访问的人太多了...
服务器压力山大...
(LZ水贴增加服务器负担,是不是要交10块钱赞助一下论坛啊?{:10_532:})

replies.author: shure
replies.txt_content: 论坛服务器是cn-zj-cmcc8……什么时候换的……？

replies.author: 银色十字梦
replies.txt_content: 最近人太多，服务器君撑不住了

replies.author: nxli226
replies.txt_content: 今天是周末，绝对是水的人太多了，服务器受不了，刷新一下就好了，这个问题到不是很大
